20101222023620.000|20101222023620.000|CC1|MAKE A NOTE, WE'RE NOW A NATION 
20101222023620.000|20101222023624.000|CC1|OF 308 MILLION PEOPLE.          
20101222023624.000|20101222023625.000|CC1|AND THAT'S UP FROM 281 MILLION A
20101222023625.000|20101222023627.000|CC1|DECADE AGO.                     
20101222023627.000|20101222023628.000|CC1|BUT IT'S THE SLOWEST POPULATION 
20101222023628.000|20101222023631.000|CC1|GROWTH IN 80 YEARS AND JON KARL 
20101222023631.000|20101222023631.000|CC1|HAS MORE TONIGHT ABOUT WHO WE   
20101222023631.000|20101222023632.000|CC1|ARE.                            
20101222023632.000|20101222023633.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WITH ALL OF THOSE  
20101222023633.000|20101222023634.000|CC1|CENSUS FORMS COUNTED WE NOW KNOW
20101222023634.000|20101222023637.000|CC1|THE EXACT NUMBER.               
20101222023637.000|20101222023639.000|CC1|308,745,538 PEOPLE LIVE IN THE  
20101222023639.000|20101222023643.000|CC1|UNITED STATES.
